response.original_title: TCHBAE (This Could Have Been an Email)
response.overview: In this dark workplace comedy, type-A Chloe faces yet another virtual meeting alongside glib Lea, brown-nosing Jamie, and their pseudo-holistic boss Grace. But today feels different—Chloe is at her breaking point. Fueled by frustration, Chloe exacts revenge on her co-workers one by one, using only the power of her brain—or perhaps something else entirely. A hilarious takedown of corporate-speak and return-to-office mandates, the film underscores one glaring truth: this whole meeting could have been an email.
response.title: TCHBAE (This Could Have Been an Email)
